title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile in a twill foundation (ciselé velvet)
description: Large rectangular panel of yellow velvet composed of three widths of material and having six selvages present. Large-scale lotus design in center. Double border of small lotus design and fret motif. Lined with blue silk cloth.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile in a twill foundation (ciselé velvet). Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1284.
